source_name: Turkish driftnet fishery for Albacore, thunnus alalunga, and incidental catches in the eastern Mediterranean
source_documentation:
individual nets 2000-7200 m
vessels
LOA 10.5-34m
GT 7-148
engine 25-1300 kW

effort_models.name: Turkish driftnet CPUE
effort_models.documentation: Directly reports n = 13 +- 1.6 per 1000 m per day; 90 +- 11 kg per 1000 m per day = 11 +-1.5 km*day per tonne; 120 days per year is a guess

gear_models.name: Turkish driftnet intensity
gear_models.documentation:
23 tex = 23 g/km = 27.6 kg/km net at 300 mesh, 55.2kg/km at 600 mesh height
Assuming longest net (7.2km) equals largest vessel, halved (34m, 148 GT, 1300 kW) and linear
NOTE: this neglects ancillary materials (lines, floats) more like 140 kg/km
